page.title: 11MY DAY BY IAN LEES AGED 11
page.content: I get up at 7.00am and I turn on Breakfast T.V. My mum makes my breakfast which is a cup of tea and some cereal with some milk. Then I get dressed and put my packed lunch,which I have at school,in my bag. Then I put on my coat and walk to school. We play for a while and go into school at 9.00 We have registration and assembly. After that we start lessons usually maths and english until dinner time. After lunch I play football until 1.30 Then we do topic or project,this takes us through to home time at 3.30.I walk home with my friends and then have tea which is usually chips or a hot dinner Then I watch T.V. or play football which is my hobby.My favourite T.V. programmes are Top of the Pops,which is pop music, and Grange Hill which is about a secondary school.I go to bed at 9.00pm.
